txt.en: Places to construct barricades can be found all around Zudramdân.\n\nYou should assist in the construction of barricades.

You have successfully constructed barricades around the ruins of Zudramdân. You hope that Náth is just worried and that this outpost will hold. You consider the amount of time that Náth spent in Mordor, surrounded by enemies, and you think that Náth may be able to foretell Zudramdân's outcome better than most.

'Hmm, I do not know how long we will be able to hold onto Zudramdân. The forces of Gundabad are numerous and Zudramdân does not have proper defences. That is our first priority.\n\n'Since you are here, would you assist in the constructing of barricades around Zudramdân?'
Náth has instructed all those available to assist in fortifying the hold at Zudramdân.
